text: Jumeirah Emirates Towers Hotel is a skyscraper in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. It is 309 meters (1,014 feet) tall and has 56 floors. It was built in 2000 and is one of the tallest buildings in the world. Jumeirah Emirates Towers Hotel is next to the Emirates Office Tower, which is also one of the tallest buildings in the world at 355m (1,163ft). ==Related pages== * List of tallest buildings in the world ==Sources== ==Other websites== * Emporis.com - Jumeirah Emirates Towers Hotel *SkycraperPage.com â€“ Jumeirah Emirates Towers Hotel Category:Skyscrapers in the United Arab Emirates Category:Hotels in the United Arab Emirates Category:Buildings and structures in Dubai Category:2000 establishments in Asia Category:Establishments in the United Arab Emirates
title: Jumeirah Emirates Towers Hotel
